job_title: Patient Service Representative in Phoenix, AZ

pros: I worked in the call center at the corporate office and I LOVED it. Everyone got along pretty well, even considering its rapid growth. I felt it was easy to speak with the Supervisor and they were very understanding with personal/family issues. They were very lenient and laid back with many things as long as you didn't take advantage. The company itself does many things to ensure patients better their health and cares especially for those who wouldn't usually have easy access to healthcare.
cons: Raises- the company does not do yearly raises with their evaluations. In my opinion, if they deem you with a perfect yearly eval and express how grateful they are to have you within the company (I don't mean me, just employees in general), then the company should be willing to give you a raise themselves for retainment. I felt many co-workers who had been there for a long period of time began to feel they weren't compensated or appreciated enough for some of the stressful situations they deal with.

job_title: Health Care Provider in Phoenix, AZ
pros: Site team leaders, staff and other providers are great; great opportunity to help the underserved get sick and well care.
cons:
Employees, including the providers, are  not well valued by senior management; extra services BH, nutrition cut thus  unavailable for the patients. 
Adelante seems to be expanding too rapidly for their own good; they are struggling to develop quality procedures to improve healthcare delivery in the sites they already have.
Senior medical management can be rather unapproachable; often does not respond to email questions and concerns. The follow thru is unfortunately poor. Doesn’t solicit our experience or insight into the problems facing us as regards scheduling, access to care. 
The CEO is nice but does not visit the sites and meet with the staff often enough.
Despite claiming to want us to have a work-life balance and a focus on quality healthcare: numbers are pushed.
Adelante has such potential to lead the way forward on health care delivery; the providers and staff do a wonderful job.

review_title: unless you are highly desperate…keep looking
